content: this pendant contain 4 styles here are cutie lemon pigg and floral fortune shiba inu the crocheting guidance available as following cutie lemon pig https //www youtube com/watch v=bo2qilkxmhs floral fortune shiba inu https //youtu be/xhgwtvvevc4 the **yarn kit** link coming soon please stay tuned for updates **shop yarn here** https //www amazon com/dp/b0dk728z9v maas=maas_adg_889c290d43de9bda447aa1cbdcc98098_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas this ornament features elements such as oranges lemons flowers and onions ingeniously combined with various small animal designs creating a vivid and lovely appearance the added feature of a removable headgear adds an extra touch of whimsy and playfulness to the piece the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
